title: Copyright and Photography Credits
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">© 2016 The Art Institute of Chicago

All rights reserved. No part of this publication may be reproduced, transmitted, or utilized in any form or by any means, electronic or mechanical, including photocopy, digital recording, or any other information storage or retrieval system (beyond that copying permitted by Sections 107 and 108 of the U.S. Copyright Law), without prior written permission from the Department of Publishing of the Art Institute of Chicago, except by a reviewer, who may quote brief passages.  

First edition  
ISBN: 978-0-86559-285-8

Produced by the Department of Publishing at the Art Institute of Chicago  
Sarah E. Guernsey, Vice President for Publishing and Design  
Edited by Wilson McBee  
Proofread by Carmel Carillo  
Production by Kelsey Coons and Lauren Makholm with assistance from Joseph Mohan  
Photography research by Katie Levi  
Designed by Beata Hosea  
OSCI-Toolkit and ChicagoCodeX Development by Tina Shah

Unless otherwise noted, photography of works of art is by Chris Gallagher, Bob Hashimoto, and Robert Lifson, with postproduction by Jonathan Mathias and Shelby Silvernell, and coordinated by P.D. Young and Amy Zavaleta, Department of Imaging, the Art Institute of Chicago.

Unless otherwise stated, all photographs appear by permission of the lenders mentioned in the captions. Every effort has been made to contact and acknowledge copyright holders for all reproductions; additional rights holders are encouraged to contact the Art Institute of Chicago. The following credits apply to all images in this catalogue for which separate acknowledgement is due.

Cat. 2–3: © The Art Institute of Chicago; cat. 6, 10, 24, 34, 36, 39, and 56: © 2016 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York / ADAGP, Paris; cat. 11: Photos 12 / Alamy Stock Photo; cat. 19: Art © The Joseph and Robert Cornell Memorial Foundation / Licensed by VAGA, New York, NY; cat. 20: © Salvador Dalí, Fundació Gala-Salvador Dalí / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York, 2016; cat. 29, 38, 43, 49–50, and 52–55: © 2016 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York / VG Bild-Kunst, Bonn; cat. 33: © Estate of André Kertész / Higher Pictures; cat. 35: © 2016 Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York / ADAGP, Paris.
